      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Returns results from cache, sorted by PK (by default), ascending.

      Returns all rows from the cache which match the filters provided.
      CDataRowSet CDataCacheContainer.get(String columnName, Object[] values)
      Returns matching data, sorted by PK (by default)
      CDataRowSet CDataCacheContainer.get(String columnName, Object[] values, String[] sortColumnNames, boolean ascending)
      Returns a collection of data objects.
      CDataRowSet CDataCacheContainer.getAll()
      Returns all rows, sorted by primary key.
      CDataRowSet CDataCacheContainer.getAll(String[] sortColumnNames, boolean ascending)
      Returns all rows in the cache.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Performs a very simple AVERAGE on a column of data in the rowset

      Returns the max value from a given column

      Merges a rowset into the current data container

      Returns the min value from a given column

      Performs a very simple SUM on a column of data in the rowset

      Performs a weighted average on a column of data in the rowset
      static Double CDataRowSetAggregator.weightedSum(CDataRowSet rowset, String valueColumnName, String weightColumnName)
      Returns a weighted sum on a particular column for the current rowset.
